Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_u6lqw510&referenceId=1_u6lqw510&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Thomson Reuters

Description: The Canadian e-commerce giant is no longer the country's most valuable company, but still trades at a stratospheric over 100 times forward EBITDA, well above rivals like Amazon.com. With investors getting more jittery of late, it could still have further to fall, says Sharon Lam.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3LFHU2y
